creator: sdeboy@iname.com
text:
Log4j 1.3 is dead..and log4j 2.0 is just coming together and will be a while before we have something folks will want to download. 

I suggest we remove those references from the page and any related content in order to keep from confusing users.

Maybe we could provide a one or two-liner on the main page saying work on log4j 2.0 is in-progress, and the abandoned 1.3 is available from svn tags folder..

creator: carnold@apache.org
text:
Have removed the log4j 1.3 and 2.0 links from the navigation menu.  The pages are still there, but are not reachable from links on the site.  Added a blurb about the companions and log4j 2.0 to index.html.

In addition, added Ralph Goers to PMC, log4j 1.2.16, and log4php 2.0.0 to site news and fixed a typo or two.
